text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.autoProgre: After an NPC finishes their line, it will automatically forward to the next line
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.blockCutOf: The minimum distance in blocks that the sound will be cut off from the speaker. For some sounds a manual adjustment is set to prevent the sound not being heard
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.debugAndLo: Should there be an aura of particles highlighting the source of the sound? This is mostly useful for debugging
If each time a dialogue that is encountered should be put into the vowlog.txt file
Log a bunch of miscellaneous things about playing sounds
If the custom audio path should be used that is defined in the next option
Custom path to audio files. This can be a url starting with (http...) or a local folder path.
A setting for logDialogueLines to only log missing lines
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.downloadSo: If all sounds should be downloaded. Enable this if you experience high latency in audio playback
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.playAllSou: This will disable the stereo effect of voices.
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.option.removeVill: Will remove the villager sounds. Enable this if they annoy you together with the voices
text.autoconfig.wynnvp.title: Voices of wynning config
